items.title: Four killed in mass Russian drone attack on Dnipro - Ukraine
items.description: Another 19 people are injured, as a restaurant and several buildings are set ablaze in the city, local officials say.

items.title: Mysterious disappearances spook residents of Caribbean island
items.description: Relatives and friends of people who have disappeared in Antigua speak to the BBC about their anguish.

items.title: Helicopter pilot recounts flying under gunfire in daring rescue mission
items.description: Ukrainian helicopter crew hailed after coming under fire during an evacuation of a military base in South Sudan.

items.title: Vance scolds Denmark during Greenland trip
items.description: Denmark's prime minister said the visit by the US VP and other top officials showed a "lack of respect".

items.title: Polish presidential candidate ridiculed for donning disguise to promote book
items.description: Karol Nawrocki has faced ridicule after it emerged that several years ago he donned a disguise to promote his own book on TV.
